summary: Project focused on deploying/redeploying an app to production (Internet Computer/ICP) and providing a live URL for access.
architectural_notes: Deployment target is Internet Computer (ICP) blockchain; app should support redeploy flows and live URL retrieval.
known_issues: Draft builds can expire, requiring rebuild/redeploy to restore a live URL.

existing_features.title: Redeploy the current application build to the Internet Computer (ICP) so a fresh live version is available again (to address the userâ€™s request to redeploy).
After the redeploy completes, surface the updated live app URL to the user in English.

new_feature_requests.summary: Deploy/redeploy the app to production on Internet Computer (ICP) blockchain
Provide and surface the live app URL after deployment
Make the app production-ready (production build, readiness checks)

projectName: Redeploy the app to ICP and provide the new live URL
